about_the_game:
Preface

In the 1980s, a man named Jack Willis was arrested for mass murder at home. The police found the man already lying on the floor with a bullet in his head. The police say there were no signs of a break-in. After this shocking news, people eventually forgot about it, but some say that he will be tormented forever in the space between heaven and hell.

Game

Sick is a mixture of intense thriller and exploration of a small surrounding world. A first-person game with a frightening atmosphere. Once in Hell, you play as Jack Willis, who roams an endless loop of suffering, pain and fear. Only you will know whether Jack will be able to get out of this horror and cleanse his soul.

Features

Atmospheric environment - an eerie and detailed world awaits you.

Psychological Experience - SICK was designed to give you the opportunity to experience psychological horror as protagonist Jack Willis

Gameplay - Intuitive mechanics and controls.

Puzzles - Collect and use items that will help your survival and progress.

Graphics - the game has 4k textures, Occlusion Culling technologies and much more.

Audio - you will feel the whole atmosphere of horror with excellent audio accompaniment and effects.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or may not be suitable for viewing in the workplace: Frequent violent or violent scenes, Adult Content.

Minimum:
  • OS: ОС: Ubuntu 16.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3240 and AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 with 2GB VRAM and AMD Radeon RX 550 with 4GB VRAM
